caption.body: In Uganda, where citizens face discrimination, violence, and arbitrary arrests simply because of who they love, documentary filmmakers Katie G. Nelson and Joshua Carlon present the voices of gay and transgender Ugandans expressing what love means to them. See "Love Is " by Katie G. Nelson and Joshua Carlon, now playing in the Video Arts gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2y7Zz0Y
caption.excerpt: In Uganda, where citizens face discrimination, violence, and arbitrary arrests simply because of who they love, documentary filmmakers Katie G. Nelson and Joshua Carlon present the voices of gay and transgender Ugandans expressing what love means to them.
